title: TFW when someone can't tell between a tank and a juggernaut

replies.body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/3o84U2oNpmeGBl6Ula/source.gif

_**I'M A TANK YOU COWARDS!!!**_

He's not just a tank.

HE'S A TANK ENGINE!
http://i.imgur.com/5yvcAmG.jpg?noredirect
"IT HAS MORE HP THAN ME, IT'S A TANK!"

_misses all the skillshots_
"Oh man, she's too tanky"
"Fucking scripts!"
{{item:3742}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3022}} Guys he's the undead juggernaut I'm just playing him like rito intended

umMMm NOo?????

{{champion:14}} and {{champion:78}} are ASSASSINS, buddy.

{{item:3142}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3814}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3078}} 

NICE TRY

Sion is whatever he wants to be. 

Tank? Check.

Juggernaut? Check.

Assassin? Check.

Wizard? Check.

Bank Teller? Check.
And most importantly, a train.

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AfEAiNBb,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-02-28T03:17:27.341+0000)
>
> Sion is whatever he wants to be. 
> 
> 
> Bank Teller? Check.

I'm dying rn. Omg, muh sides.
Yes! I'm so glad people got the joke!
I didn't.

http://u.osu.edu/treasurer/files/2014/10/Brutus-Buckeye-Check-1seayl8.jpg
Check.
Still don't get it.

Sigh... Young folks these days...

Don't even understand what a check is...
27, and regardless, don't like having my age thrown at me as an insult.

if having your age thrown at you as an insult is common occurrence maybe you should go and educate yourself as to why.

Don't tell other people to be better. make yourself better.

I have my race thrown at me at me as an insult often as well. How do I educate myself on that? Also wanting someone to explain a joke involving Sion and bank tellers isn't the biggest sign of a lack of intellect.

the joke isn't about sion as bank teller, its about bank teller and bank checks, he did a check list and said check at the end of each line, bank teller work with checks, and so bank teller Check.

I Apologize if I got the joke wrong!

I think Chromatic kind of has a point. I didn't miss the joke because of my age (21, and I know what a check is considering that's how I get paid), but because I just missed it.

It's one of those "when you think about it" jokes for some of us :(

Laughed my ass off when you finally pointed it out, though. That was pretty damn clever.

> Bank Teller? Check.

The only joke here is your current account balance
It goes down faster than Sion's health bar while his passive is active.
Ouch.

> Bank Teller

Get a Loan you cowards!

Roar of the **Slayer**
Maybe he's a skirmisher instead of assassin?
I actually lost to that once
It's not really surprising. He deals tons of damage.
We'd kill him pretty easy but then with his passive he'd just murder everyone lmao it was crazy
Especially when that Juggernaut is also a part Diver hybrid... {{champion:102}}
Or when that tank is also a ranged melee tanky-DPS mage support jungler.  {{champion:64}}
he's also an assassin too (R-Q-Q)
It's an old joke from his champion spotlight that came on on April fools. I literally copied how Phreak introduced him minus the word "tank" due to context.
If there's one kind of main that hates this, its a Sion main.
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/8f/Hemorrhage.png?noredirect
This hits me on so many levels.
You're doing your job as a tank then?
Oh you know it.
Sion the Undead "Juggernaut"
https://media.giphy.com/media/xT5LMOAdqnb9K0o7Uk/giphy.gif
http://www.shawnolson.net/media/1_Shawn_lys_pouts_2_28_04_2062.jpg

You'll regret the day when you meet lethality sion
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/j4t5hwjE7c4/hqdefault.jpg
If there's anyone who synergizes with lethality well, it's Sion and Kindred.
Why kindred?
https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s320x320/e15/11377503_541239946016436_964945890_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=OTk0MTMyMzUxMjAyMjg4NTQ5.2

"We have Shyvana we're good for a tank"
~All of my friends 2k17.
This is why I'm bronze. I only play League with friends. And friends say this.

> [{quoted}](name=DepressedAhri,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AfEAiNBb,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-02-28T06:15:31.125+0000)
>
> "We have Shyvana we're good for a tank"
> ~All of my friends 2k17.
> This is why I'm bronze. I only play League with friends. And friends say this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fg9pkAYvrSM

TFW someone writes ''When'' after ''TFW''

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/a8/Roar_of_the_Slayer.png?noredirect

Sigh, not again...
I done goofed

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/20e989976bdc9ddcfa38eb22b6138a12d7c33df84ca1e4ee775c0057cb9607c4.png

This is relevant.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y2A6oNtpFuM

This song triggered me. I don't know if it was being Ironic with the Juggernaut/Tank issue or if it was saying Juggernauts are tanks .-.
